names.placeOfBirth: New York City, New York, USA
names.bio: Billy Gray was born on March 17, 1904 in New York City, New York, USA as William Victor Giventer. He was an actor, known for Some Like It Hot (1959), Two for the Seesaw (1962) and The Thin Man (1957). He died on January 4, 1978 in Los Angeles, California, USA.
names.name: Billy Gray
